type HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具 (Visual Designer) 中，為 控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是基底類別衍生您自己的資料來源設計工具，自訂資料來源控制項衍生自類別。The class is a base class for deriving your own data source designer for a custom data source control derived from the class. 衍生自其他類別都和。Other classes that derive from are and .

related.span: 擴充設計階段支援
如何：在設計模式中擴充控制項的外觀和行為

span.span: How to: Extend the Appearance and Behavior of Controls in Design Mode

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否可以呼叫 方法。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the method can be called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用這個屬性來判斷是否要顯示**設定**命令，在 [設計] 檢視中的智慧標籤功能表。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Configure** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計主應用程式，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，會使用這個屬性來判斷是否要顯示**重新整理結構描述**命令，在 [設計] 檢視中的智慧標籤功能表。A design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses this property to determine whether to show a **Refresh Schema** command in the Smart-Tag menu in design view.

summary.span: 資料來源的屬性已變更且 屬性值為 時，會引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the properties of the data source have changed and the property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，通知每個控制項繫結至相關聯的資料來源，以重新整理其設計主應用程式中的控制項設計工具。The method notifies the designer of each control bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 這個方法可以隱藏具有方法，或藉由呼叫方法的引數`false`。This method can be suppressed with the method, or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀

summary.span: 資料來源的結構描述已變更且 屬性值為 時，會引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the schema of the data source has changed and the property value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會通知每個控制項繫結至結構描述中的欄位已變更的相關聯的資料來源設計工具。This method notifies the designers of each control bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. 這個方法可以隱藏具有方法，或藉由呼叫方法的引數`true`。This method can be suppressed with the method, or by calling the method with an argument of `true`.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀
擴充設計階段支援
